problems.title: Diamond Pattern
problems.description:
Write a program to print a diamond pattern of stars of height 2n-1.

Input Format:
A single integer n (half height).

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3

Sample Output
  *
 ***
*****
 ***
  *

Explanation:
A diamond with max width 5 is printed.
hintsList: Combine a pyramid and an inverted pyramid.
Handle the middle row carefully to avoid duplication.
